name: Hibi
description: An Android app designed to aid your Japanese learning through keeping a journal.

name: Event Management System
description: A system for the management of Security and Stewarding staff at events created as a final year project for my BEng Software Engineering degree.

name: Twitch Chat Spotify Bot
description: This is a bot that listens to the chat of a given Twitch stream for messages with a Spotify song link in them and then adds that song to a playlist and/or your queue.
